channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- real.Kit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- real.Kit

item.title: CVE-2023-0364|2024-08-02T05:10:55.529Z -- unknown -- real.kit
item.description: The real.Kit WordPress plugin before 5.1.1 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
